casebody.data:
(November 18, 1953.)

(Republish)

Sandra R. Hearst, Respondent, v. George R. Hearst, Appellant.

Order unanimously modified by fixing temporary alimony at the rate of $500 per month and counsel fee at $7,500. In the circumstances of this case, we think the allowances for temporary alimony and counsel fee were excessive. Settle order on notice. Present — Cohn, J. P., Breitel, Bastow, Botein and Bergan, JJ. [See ante, p. 933.]
